hero.title: Creating beyond boundaries.
hero.subtitle: I’m a Backend Developer and Cloud Computing passionate about building reliable infrastructures and intelligent systems powered by Machine Learning.

about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: I’m Mochamad Ryan Hanafi, a Backend Engineer with strong expertise in Cloud Computing, dedicated to building efficient, secure, and scalable systems using Express.js, Laravel, and Golang. I have hands-on experience managing Redis, RabbitMQ, MySQL, and MongoDB to ensure high backend performance, as well as deploying and managing modern infrastructure on Google Cloud Platform (GCP).
about.paragraph2: In addition, I possess skills in Machine Learning, including data collection, model design, training, and deployment of accurate and cloud-integrated models. Combining technical expertise with a passion for innovation, I am committed to delivering reliable, adaptive, and high-performance technology solutions that drive efficiency and scalability.
